DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate effect perioperative glutamine supplement total parenteral nutrition support nutritional status , immunologic function intestinal permeability patient chronic radiation intestinal injury . Methods : The 40 patient CRII randomize two group , standard TPN group glutamine-enriched TPN group . The patient administer total parenteral nutrition least four week ( two week pre-operation two week post-operation ) . The nutritional status , immunologic function , plasma concentration glutamine intestinal permeability measure 1 day , 1 week 2 week pre-operation , 3 day , 1 week 2 week post-operation . Nutrition status determine plasma concentration hemoglobin , albumin , prealbumin , transferrin triglyceride . Immunologic function measure percentage CD4+T cell CD8+T cell , ratio CD4 +T cell CD8+T cell ( CD4 +/CD8 + ) calculated， serum IgA , IgM IgG．The intestinal permeability detect urinal ratio lactulose mannitol .
